notification.contentToBeAnonymized: E hūnā ʻia kāu ʻike i loko o nā lā 7 no
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: E hūnā ʻia a e waiho ʻia kāu ʻike a pau i kēia kaiaulu a e waiho ʻia i loko o nā lā 7, ma hope o kēlā ʻaʻole ʻoe e hiki ke holoi iā ia a i ʻole ke loli iā ia. E nānā i kāu ʻike ma lalo.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: E hūnā ʻia a e waiho ʻia kāu ʻike a pau i kēia hui a e waiho ʻia i loko o nā lā 7, ma hope o kēlā ʻaʻole ʻoe e hiki ke holoi iā ia a i ʻole ke loli iā ia. E nānā i kāu ʻike ma lalo.

post.statusChangeSubject: Ua loli ke kūlana o ka leka

email.possibleFraudFooter: Kaomi ma ka loulou kaiaulu ma lalo, komo ma ke ʻano he admin a koho i ka Fraud management mai ka papa kuhikuhi.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Helu o nā hana hewa hiki ke hana me ka manawa 75% o ka hewa
email.possibleFraudInformation: Ua ʻike ʻia e kā mākou ʻōnaehana akomi ka hana hewa hiki ke hana. Hiki iā ʻoe ke nānā pono i ka ʻike ma o ka interface admin kaiaulu. Hiki ke loaʻa nā kumu ʻole hewa no kekahi o kēia mau hana no laila e nānā pono ma mua o ka holoi ʻana i ka ʻike.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Ua hōʻailona ʻia kēia ʻike ma ke ʻano he mea ʻino ma o nā algorithms AI e kūkākūkā ana i ka ʻino o ka ʻike. Hiki iā ʻoe ke holoi i ka ʻike inā pono.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Ua hōʻailona ʻia kahi kiʻi ʻike ma o kēia ʻike e kahi algorithm AI ma ke ʻano akomi. Ke nānā nei kēia algorithm i nā kiʻi no nā kiʻi makua, ʻino, lapaʻau, a me nā kiʻi ʻino. Hiki iā ʻoe ke holoi i ka ʻike inā pono.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: I kekahi manawa, ke helu nei ka algorithm AI i kahi helu hewa, i kēlā hihia mai e hopohopo ʻole, ʻaʻole ʻoe e pono e hana hou aku a hiki ke nānā ʻole i kēia leka uila.
email.automaticToxicityHowLikely: Pehea ka likelihood (%) e lilo i mea ʻawahia
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Kikokikona Pelekānia i hoʻohana ʻia no ka helu

email.reset_password_1: Eia ka loulou e hoʻololi ai i kāu ʻōlelo huna.
email.reset_password_2: Inā ʻaʻole ʻoe i noi i kēia, e ʻoluʻolu e nānā ʻole i kēia leka uila.
email.reset_password_3: ʻAʻole e loli kāu ʻōlelo huna a hiki i kou komo ʻana i ka loulou ma luna a hana i mea hou.
